mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_name, me_phone, me_postcode, me_address, me_detailAddress, me_extraAddress, me_birth, me_gender) VALUES (#{m.me_id}, #{m.me_pw}, #{m.me_email}, #{m.me_name}, #{m.me_phone}, #{m.me_postcode}, #{m.me_address}, #{m.me_detailAddress}, #{m.me_extraAddress}, #{m.me_birth}, #{m.me_gender})
mapper.select: SELECT * from member WHERE me_cookie = #{me_cookie} AND me_limit > now()
mapper.update: update member set me_cookie = #{user.me_cookie}, me_limit = #{user.me_limit} where me_id = #{user.me_id}
